New Records: Ja Morant's first spinning layup over Nets center Nic Claxton in the second quarter is already the NBA's most-watched Facebook reel ever with more than 78 million views in less than 24 hours.
Key Match Events: Ja Morant performed two 360-spinning layups during the game against the Brooklyn Nets, which have generated more than 161 million views across NBA social media platforms.
